content: Come up with three new words and their definitions, but each definition must include at least one synonym and one antonym. Additionally, the words and their definitions must be presented in a table format with each row representing a word and its definition. Finally, the definitions must be written in Latex format.

Here is a table presenting three newly coined words along with their definitions in LaTeX format:

\[
\begin{array}{|c|l|}
\hline
\textbf{Word} & \textbf{Definition in LaTeX Format} \\
\hline
\text{Glimmerflux} & \text{A state where light fluctuates between being bright and dim, synonymous with shimmer, opposite of steady.} \\
\hline
\text{Zelothrive} & \text{The act of passionately growing in a pursuit, akin to flourish, contrary to wither.} \\
\hline
\text{Serendowave} & \text{An unexpected wave of fortune, similar to luck, antithetical to misfortune.} \\
\hline
\end{array}
\]

Each of these words is crafted with a unique blend of meaning, incorporating both synonyms and antonyms in their definitions.
